title: 256S.203 CUSTOMIZED LIVING SERVICES; MANAGED CARE RATES.
text:
The commissioner must adjust the elderly waiver capitation payment rates for managed care organizations paid to reflect the monthly service rate limits for customized living services and 24-hour customized living services established under section 256S.202 and the rate adjustments for disproportionate share facilities under section 256S.205.
Medical assistance rates paid to customized living providers by managed care organizations under this chapter must not exceed the monthly service rate limits and component rates as determined by the commissioner under sections 256S.15 and 256S.20 to 256S.202, plus any rate adjustment under section 256S.205.
